name: Alien Shooter (itch) (JustPhilip)
description:
Alien Shooter

Save the world from aliens

Shoot the green aliens and not the innocent purple birds .

Get a score of 40 and you have saved the planet.

Also, you have limited bullets

⚠⚠

Best Played on Windows, Never tried on Mac and Linux, but try if you can. But if you're system crashes, it's your fault not mine

😎😋✌
